channel.title: Connection's Problem
channel.description:
I don't know if this should be under this section or under the tutorials section but can someone help me with other players connecting to my server. When I type "localhost" I can get in but other people can't seem to get in. Do I need to port-forward? Can someone explain what to do?
Thank-you! :)

item.title: Connection's Problem
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

If you have a no-ip, you might need to port forward.

I’d advise you not to port forward, because you could loose valuble passwords that you dont want other people to know (ex: banking pins, email passwords, etc.) But it’s your choice. If you dont do any of that stuff on your computer, go ahead and port forward.

But if you choose not too, as bad as it is, you could use hamachi. I agree, it might suck, but thats why I went with it, to keep my personal information safe from other people knowing

Heres the link to download Hamachi if you change you mind: http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php

Read full topic
